event.title: a two-vehicle crash at the intersection of North Nokomis Street and Darling Avenue near the Re/Max realty office in Alexandria Friday night

data.event: An Alexandria man remains hospitalized after a two-vehicle crash at the intersection of North Nokomis Street and Darling Avenue near the Re/Max realty office in Alexandria Friday night.

event.title: was listed in fair condition Tuesday morning

data.event: Sachs, 58, was taken to the Douglas County Hospital and later transferred to St. Cloud Hospital where he was listed in fair condition Tuesday morning.
